collector.description: The name or identifier of the entity which collected the observation

germplasmDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies a germplasm

germplasmName.description: Name of the germplasm. It can be the preferred name and does not have to be unique.

observationDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies an observation

observationTimeStamp.description: The date and time when this observation was made

observationUnitDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies an observation unit

observationUnitName.description: A human readable name for an observation unit

observationVariableDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies an observation variable

observationVariableName.description: A human readable name for an observation variable

studyDbId.description: The ID which uniquely identifies a study within the given database server

uploadedBy.description: The name or id of the user who uploaded the observation to the database system

value.description: The value of the data collected as an observation
